#summary Spring service to manage the HttpSession

= HttpSessionService =

The HttpSessionService allows to manage the HttpSession using a HttpSessionFacade or directly manipulate attributes using a Map view.

{{{
&lt;context:annotation-config /&gt;
&lt;bean class=&quot;org.omnaest.utils.spring.HttpSessionAndServletRequestResolverService&quot; /&gt;
&lt;bean class=&quot;org.omnaest.utils.spring.HttpSessionService&quot; /&gt;
}}}
